text: Duplicates input poly-curves and manipulates the copies with twists, flares and noise to increase visual complexity. Manipulations may be controlled with point attributes
Will optionally fuse, resample and calculate u-values for incoming curves.
An optional 2nd input allows for custom cross-sections input. The incoming points must lie in the XZ plane. The 'total phase' parameter should usually be set to zero when using a 2nd input
May be useful for creating ropes
